# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #89](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#89)

#### J. Dauro

Gary Singer asks, Do the Myrddraal channel the True Power to move between shadows?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I don't believe so.
